definitions: the action or fact of preventing someone or something from continuing to a destination
shortDefinitions: action or fact of preventing someone or something from continuing to destination

definitions: an act of a defensive player catching a forward pass

examples.text: Oliver forced a fumble and had three interceptions, two of which were returned for touchdowns

shortDefinitions: act of catching pass made by opposing player

definitions: the action or fact of receiving electronic transmissions before they reach the intended recipient

examples.text: the clandestine interception of other people's telephone calls

shortDefinitions: action or fact of receiving electronic transmissions before they reach intended recipient
